mapper.sql:
SELECT record_no, record_user_id, record_title, latitude, longitude, checkpoint_address, DATE_FORMAT(checkpoint_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS checkpoint_date, media_name, category_no, record_text, temp_type, DATE_FORMAT(record_add_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS record_add_date, DATE_FORMAT(shared_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS shared_date, update_count, d_day_date, timecapsule_type FROM record
shared_date is not null
AND temp_type=0
AND temp_type=1
AND timecapsule_type=0
AND timecapsule_type=1
AND d_day_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
AND record_user_id=#{userId}
AND checkpoint_date BETWEEN #{selectDay1} AND #{selectDay2}
ORDER BY checkpoint_date ASC, checkpoint_date IS NULL DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT a1.record_no AS record_no, a1.record_user_id AS record_user_id, a1.checkpoint_address AS checkpoint_address, a1.checkpoint_date AS checkpoint_date, a2.image_tag_text AS image_tag_text FROM record a1 LEFT JOIN image_tag a2 ON a1.record_no = a2.record_no
a1.record_user_id=#{userId} AND a1.checkpoint_date BETWEEN TIMESTAMP(#{selectDate}, #{checkpointTime}) AND TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(#{selectDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), #{checkpointTime}) AND a1.temp_type=1 AND a1.timecapsule_type=0 AND a2.image_tag_type=1
ORDER BY rand() limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE record SET record_user_id = #{recordUserId:VARCHAR}, record_title = #{recordTitle:VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude:DOUBLE}, longitude = #{longitude:DOUBLE}, checkpoint_address = #{checkpointAddress:VARCHAR}, checkpoint_date = #{checkpointDate:TIMESTAMP}, media_name = #{mediaName:VARCHAR}, category_no = #{categoryNo:NUMERIC}, record_text = #{recordText:VARCHAR}, temp_type = #{tempType:TINYINT}, record_add_date = #{recordAddDate:TIMESTAMP}, shared_date = #{sharedDate:TIMESTAMP}, update_count = #{updateCount:NUMERIC}, d_day_date = #{d_DayDate:DATE}, timecapsule_type = #{timecapsuleType:TINYINT} WHERE record_no = #{recordNo:NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM image_tag WHERE image_tag_order=#{imageTagOrder} AND image_tag_type=1
mapper.update: UPDATE record SET media_name = NULL WHERE record_no = #{recordNo:NUMERIC}
UPDATE category SET CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName:VARCHAR}, CATEGORY_IMOJI = #{categoryImoji:VARCHAR} WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo:NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT a1.record_user_id AS record_user_id, COUNT(a1.d_day_date) AS timecapsule_count, a2.phone_number AS phone_number FROM record a1 LEFT JOIN users a2 ON a1.record_user_id=a2.user_id WHERE d_day_date BETWEEN TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_DATE(), #{dDayTime}) AND TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), #{dDayTime}) AND temp_type=1 AND timecapsule_type=1 GROUP BY record_user_id

SELECT a1.record_no AS record_no, a1.record_user_id AS record_user_id, a1.record_title AS record_title, a1.latitude AS latitude, a1.longitude AS longitude, a1.checkpoint_address AS checkpoint_address, DATE_FORMAT(a1.checkpoint_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS checkpoint_date, a1.media_name AS media_name, a1.category_no AS category_no, a1.record_text AS record_text, a1.temp_type AS temp_type, DATE_FORMAT(a1.record_add_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS record_add_date, DATE_FORMAT(a1.shared_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS shared_date, a1.update_count AS update_count, a1.d_day_date AS d_day_date, a1.timecapsule_type AS timecapsule_type, (SELECT nickname FROM users u WHERE u.USER_ID = a1.RECORD_USER_ID) AS nickname, (SELECT profile_image_name FROM users u WHERE u.USER_ID = a1.RECORD_USER_ID) AS profile_image_name, CASE WHEN (SELECT subscription_end_date FROM subscription s WHERE s.USER_ID = a1.RECORD_USER_ID) > CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS subscription_end_date, (SELECT category_name FROM category c WHERE c.CATEGORY_NO = a1.CATEGORY_NO) AS category_name, (SELECT category_imoji FROM category c WHERE c.CATEGORY_NO = a1.CATEGORY_NO) AS category_imoji, (CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM community_logs l WHERE l.record_no = a1.record_no AND l.logs_type = 1 AND l.user_id = #{userId}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS bookmark, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_logs l WHERE l.record_no = a1.record_no AND l.reply_no IS NULL AND l.logs_type = 2) AS like_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_logs l WHERE l.record_no = a1.record_no AND l.reply_no IS NULL AND l.logs_type = 3) AS dislike_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply p WHERE p.RECORD_NO = a1.RECORD_NO) AS reply_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_logs l WHERE LOGS_TYPE = 0 AND l.RECORD_NO = a1.RECORD_NO) logs_count,
a2.image_tag_order AS image_tag_order, a2.image_tag_type AS image_tag_type, a2.image_tag_text AS image_tag_text FROM record a1 LEFT JOIN image_tag a2 ON a1.record_no = a2.record_no WHERE a1.record_no = #{recordNo}
mapper.sql:
SELECT RECORD_NO, RECORD_USER_ID, RECORD_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(r.shared_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS shared_date, UPDATE_COUNT, (SELECT nickname FROM users u WHERE u.USER_ID = r.RECORD_USER_ID) AS nickname, (SELECT profile_image_name FROM users u WHERE u.USER_ID = r.RECORD_USER_ID) AS profile_image_name, CASE WHEN (SELECT subscription_end_date FROM subscription s WHERE s.USER_ID = r.RECORD_USER_ID ORDER BY subscription_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) > CURRENT_DATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS subscription_end_date, (SELECT IMAGE_TAG_TYPE FROM image_tag i WHERE i.RECORD_NO = r.RECORD_NO limit 1) AS IMAGE_TAG_TYPE, (SELECT IMAGE_TAG_TEXT FROM image_tag i WHERE i.RECORD_NO = r.RECORD_NO limit 1) AS IMAGE_TAG_TEXT, (SELECT category_name FROM category c WHERE c.CATEGORY_NO = r.CATEGORY_NO) AS category_name, (SELECT category_imoji FROM category c WHERE c.CATEGORY_NO = r.CATEGORY_NO) AS category_imoji, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply p WHERE p.RECORD_NO = r.RECORD_NO) AS reply_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_logs l WHERE LOGS_TYPE = 0 AND l.RECORD_NO = r.RECORD_NO) AS logs_count FROM record r
shared_date IS NOT NULL AND temp_type=1 AND timecapsule_type=0
AND (a1.record_text LIKE #{searchKeyword} OR a1.record_title LIKE #{searchKeyword} OR a1.record_no IN ( SELECT record_no FROM image_tag WHERE IMAGE_TAG_TYPE = 0 AND image_tag_text LIKE #{searchKeyword}))
AND a1.category_no=#{categoryNo}
ORDER BY shared_date DESC, shared_date IS NULL DESC

SELECT a1.record_no AS record_no, a1.record_title AS record_title, a3.category_name AS category_name, a3.category_imoji AS category_imoji,
DATE_FORMAT(a1.record_add_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS record_add_date,
a2.image_tag_order AS image_tag_order, a2.image_tag_type AS image_tag_type, a2.image_tag_text AS image_tag_text FROM record a1 LEFT JOIN image_tag a2 ON a1.record_no = a2.record_no AND a2.image_tag_type=1 LEFT JOIN category a3 ON a1.category_no = a3.category_no
a1.record_user_id = #{userId} AND a1.shared_date IS NOT NULL AND a1.temp_type=1 AND a1.timecapsule_type=0
OR ( a1.record_no IN ( SELECT record_no FROM community_logs WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND logs_type=1 ) AND a1.shared_date IS NOT NULL AND a1.temp_type=1 AND a1.timecapsule_type=0 )
OR ( a1.record_no IN ( SELECT record_no FROM community_logs WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND logs_type=2 ) AND a1.shared_date IS NOT NULL AND a1.temp_type=1 AND a1.timecapsule_type=0 )
ORDER BY a1.record_add_date IS NULL DESC, a1.record_add_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
